items.title: Noodl AI (Beta)
items.text: Noodl AI is now in open beta! Generate your building blocks from prompts. Checkout the guide bellow to get started

items.title: Accelerate development with Prefabs
items.text: Import pre-made UI components (Prefabs) in to your project. Prefabs are build with core nodes and can easly be customized.

items.title: OpenAI Prefab
items.text: Bring AI and chatbot capabilities, based on ChatGPT, into your apps by using the OpenAi Prefab.

items.title: States node: Animations
items.text: Did you know that you can use the States node to create custom animations?
